description: Source code for a Bootstrap Grunt task that parses Less documentation strings, including classes and functions for handling sections, subsections, variables, and markdown conversion.

classes.name: Section
classes.description: Represents a section in the Less documentation with heading, id, and subsections.

classes.name: SubSection
classes.description: Represents a subsection within a section, containing variables.

classes.name: VarDocstring
classes.description: Handles markdown conversion for variable documentation strings.

classes.name: SectionDocstring
classes.description: Handles markdown conversion for section documentation strings.

classes.name: Variable
classes.description: Represents a variable with name, default value, and optional documentation.

classes.name: Tokenizer
classes.description: Tokenizes the file content into sections, subsections, variables, and docstrings.

classes.name: Parser
classes.description: Main parser class that processes tokens into structured sections and variables.

methods.name: markdown2html
methods.description:
Converts markdown string to HTML, removing surrounding

tags.

methods.name: Section.prototype.addSubSection
methods.description: Adds a subsection to a section.

methods.name: SubSection.prototype.addVar
methods.description: Adds a variable to a subsection.

methods.name: Tokenizer.prototype.unshift
methods.description: Pushes a token back onto the token stream.

methods.name: Tokenizer.prototype._shift
methods.description: Retrieves the next token from the input lines, parsing lines into tokens.

methods.name: Tokenizer.prototype.shift
methods.description: Retrieves the next token, skipping undefined tokens.

methods.name: Parser.prototype.parseFile
methods.description: Parses the entire file into sections.

methods.name: Parser.prototype.parseSection
methods.description: Parses a single section from tokens.

methods.name: Parser.prototype.parseVar
methods.description: Parses a single variable with optional documentation.
